reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Achieve Zero Local Malaria Transmission in Botswana by 2020

description.narrative: Botswana - Malaria - Botswana-Ministry of Health and Wellness - MOHW. This program has the following goals: To achieve zero local malaria transmission in Botswana by 2020.. The objectives of this program are: To develop a robust information system for trackin progress and decision making by 2016. To effect behaviour change through reaching at least 90% of the population with appropriate information for malaria elimianation by 2017. To detect all malaria infection through appropriate diagnostic methods and provide effective treatment by 2016. To achieve total coverage with all appropriate vector control interventions in all transmisssion foci by 2016. By 2016, develop the requisite capacity in the programme at all levels to achieve malaria elimination
